Joe Odagiri is the actor portraying Saitou Hajime in the NHK TAiga 
drama...so I did some online stalking...errr research and found that he 
was in the following movies

BRIGHT FUTURE dir. by Kiyoshi Kurosawa ALSO starring Tadanobu 
Asano *hottie* (starred in Gohatto/Taboo and Gojoe)

AZUMI...I can't really recommend this film because the director also 
directed a film called VERSUS which was -horrible- and reviewers are 
saying that AZUMI is basically VERSUS with swords...
